Me: I secure the premises anyway. I head up to my room, listen to some 
music then get a drink. If there's noises I look for whoever's trying to 
prank me. That's literally it. It's pointless me looking for a weapon 
because if I'm downstairs and they're upstairs they've probably already 
found the sword. It's pointless worrying.﻿

Me everytime watching or seeing a jumpscare
1. I Grab A weapon

3. I Turn on all lights

6. I get my big poofs blanket
7. I hide somewhere 
8. And of course the final I text my friends and sob I also pretend im dead 
if i hear footsteps

IM WEIRD XD
